Cannot reproduce the problem with D:\TPTP-4.2.0-200604101029

An issue persists with TPTP-4.2.0-200604120817 driver. 

Steps to re-produce:
1. Create new symptom database (chose Symptom 2.0 format)
2. Select Catalog <database name> -> Reuse -> Definition

The context menu item is indeed enabled, reopening defect.
